tool_description: An API showing all the latest Ukrainian War News
name: Ukraine War News Live
title: Ukraine War News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News about the War in Ukraine
api_list.description: Gets News about the War in Ukraine from a specific news website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine War News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about the War in Ukraine from 10 different news websites.
